Description: 
This application implements two commands to demonstrate the creation and removal of GROUP.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "Samples.sln" and switch to the configuration that matches with the ZWCAD versionï¼Œthen build the application.

To use MakeGroup.zrx:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing .
2. Run APPLOAD command and load the MakeGroup.zrx file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "groupTest" command, which  makes a (anonymous) group by the parameters specified.
4. Execute the "unGroupTest" command, which breaks up the group that you specify.
